data.title: Martin Scorsese: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Martin Scorsese: Check out the list of all Martin Scorsese movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Martin Scorsese news on Times of India.
data.text:
Chris Hemsworth responds to critics of MCU movies

etimes.in / May 15, 2024, 12:28 (IST)

Chris Hemsworth, renowned for his portrayal of Thor in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU), recently defended superhero films against criticism from directors like Martin Scorsese and Quentin Tarantino. He pointed out that even esteemed directors have had movies that didn't resonate with audiences, questioning the validity of their critiques. Hemsworth emphasized the immense popularity of superhero movies worldwide, highlighting the significance of the billions who enjoy them. Reflecting on his performance in 'Thor: Love and Thunder,' Hemsworth admitted to immersing himself in its improvisational and humorous aspects, contributing to its success. Despite feeling he could've improved, he acknowledged becoming a caricature of his character.

Roger Corman, Hollywood mentor and 'King of the Bs,' dies at 98

AP / May 13, 2024, 03:53 (IST)

Roger Corman, the iconic filmmaker known for his low-budget classics and launching the careers of Hollywood's biggest names, has died at the age of 95 in Santa Monica, California. Corman's legacy in cinema and his impact on the industry will be remembered for generations to come.

Martin Scorsese 'VIBING' to Ryan Gosling's 'I'm Just Ken' performance goes viral - WATCH

etimes.in / Mar 12, 2024, 10:59 (IST)

Martin Scorsese, after losing at the Oscars, was captured on video enjoying Ryan Gosling's performance of the Oscar-nominated Barbie song I'm Just Ken. The footage went viral, showing Scorsese dancing and having a great time with his granddaughter Francesca. Cillian Murphy and other Hollywood stars were also seen on their feet, clapping and singing along to the lyrics of the hit track.

Eva Mendes cheers as Martin Scorsese jams to Ryan Gosling's Oscars performance

Mar 13, 2024, 12:38 (IST)

As for Gosling's performance, he wowed the audience with his rendition of "I Am Just Ken," featuring other Kens like Ncuti Gatwa and Simu Liu. Although Gosling didn't win any awards that night, his performance brought a burst of energy to the room. Mendes shared a photo on Instagram wearing the same pink coat Gosling wore during his performance, praising him for taking Ken all the way to the Oscars.

When Shah Rukh Khan was supposed to work with Leonardo Dicaprio and Martin Scorsese

etimes.in / Feb 18, 2024, 09:00 (IST)

Shah Rukh Khan revealed at the World Government Summit in Dubai that he has never been offered a Hollywood or English film. Reports from years ago suggested he was to star in "Xtreme City" with Leonardo DiCaprio, directed by Martin Scorsese and Paul Schrader. The project never materialized, with Schrader citing SRK's lack of comfort with not having total control.

Leonardo DiCaprio recommends THIS anime to director Martin Scorsese

etimes.in / Jan 22, 2024, 14:40 (IST)

Leonardo DiCaprio recommended Martin Scorsese to watch 'Spirited Away' during an interview on Letterboxd. They also discussed 'Princess Mononoke,' their collaborations in films like 'Gangs of New York' and 'Killers of the Flower Moon.' In a memoir by Steve Alpert, it was mentioned that Hayao Miyazaki declined Scorsese's invitation to meet in New York City.

Wife of Oscar-nominated producer for ‘Killers of the Flower Moon’ dies by suicide; jumps out of hotel room window

etimes.in / Feb 02, 2024, 07:06 (IST)

Oscar-nominated producer Bradley Thomas grapples with the tragic loss of his wife Isabelle Thomas, who was found dead at a Los Angeles hotel in an apparent suicide. The couple, who tied the knot in 2018 and shared two children, had been a prominent presence at movie premieres and red-carpet events in Hollywood.

Oscar 2024 complete list of nominations: Oppenheimer dominates major categories; Barbie gets snubbed

etimes.in / Jan 23, 2024, 19:56 (IST)

Zazie Beetz and Jack Quaid unveiled the nominations for the 96th Academy Awards at the Samuel Goldwyn Theater in Beverly Hills, California. The announcement was broadcasted live on the Academy's social media platforms. The comprehensive list of nominees encompasses various categories, acknowledging exceptional accomplishments in the film industry. These nominations pave the way for the highly awaited awards ceremony, dedicated to honoring excellence in cinema.

Ranveer Singh wishes to work with Martin Scorsese

etimes.in / Dec 02, 2023, 15:16 (IST)

Ranveer Singh discusses his acting journey and expresses his desire to work with Martin Scorsese. He recalls Amitabh Bachchan's influence on his passion for acting, particularly in the movie 'Don'. Singh also mentions his interest in alternative professions like writing and teaching. He recently watched Scorsese's 'Killers of the Flower Moon' and looks forward to the upcoming film 'Napoleon'. On the cinematic front, Singh was last seen in 'Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani' and is rumored to star in Sanjay Leela Bhansali's 'Baiju Bawra'. He is also part of Rohit Shetty's 'Singham Again' and Farhan Akhtar's 'Don 3', alongside a star-studded cast.

Martin Scorsese's 'Jesus' to start shooting later this year, has an anticipated runtime of 80 minutes

etimes.in / Jan 09, 2024, 12:12 (IST)

Director Martin Scorsese has wrapped up the screenplay for his much-anticipated film centered around 'Jesus,' initially teased in May. The renowned filmmaker shared that the project, slated for filming later this year, is set to be a succinct 80 minutes. With an intent to enhance accessibility and mitigate negative perceptions associated with organized religion, Scorsese collaboratively wrote the script with critic and filmmaker Kent Jones. Drawing inspiration from Shūsaku Endō’s book, "A Life of Jesus," the film responds to the Pope's call to artists by concentrating on Jesus' fundamental teachings, steering clear of specific religious ideologies.

Golden Globes 2024: Christopher Nolan remembers "dear friend" Heath Ledger in acceptance speech

ANI / Jan 08, 2024, 11:47 (IST)

Christopher Nolan, the esteemed filmmaker, clinched his inaugural Golden Globe for Best Director-Motion Picture with the biopic 'Oppenheimer.' Competing against Bradley Cooper, Greta Gerwig, Yorgos Lanthimos, Martin Scorsese, and Celine Song, Nolan expressed gratitude during his acceptance speech. Reflecting on his previous experience accepting an award on behalf of his "Dear Friend" Heath Ledger, Nolan acknowledged the emotional complexity of the moment. Ledger's posthumous recognition for his portrayal of the Joker in Nolan's 'The Dark Knight' resonated deeply. 'Oppenheimer,' set against the backdrop of World War II, explores the ethical quandaries faced by J. Robert Oppenheimer, the "Father of the Atomic Bomb."

Golden Globes 2024: Lily Gladstone wins Best Female Actor for 'Killers of The Flower Moon'

ANI / Jan 08, 2024, 11:41 (IST)

Lily Gladstone secured a historic victory at the 81st Golden Globes, winning the Best Female Actor-Motion Picture award for her role in Martin Scorsese's 'Killers of The Flower Moon.' The talented actress becomes the first Indigenous woman to receive this accolade. Gladstone, who opened her acceptance speech in the Blackfeet language, expressed gratitude to her mother for championing Blackfeet language education. She acknowledged the collective significance of the win, emphasizing the collaborative efforts of fellow actresses and her mother. In 'Killers of The Flower Moon,' Gladstone portrayed Mollie Kyle, the Indigenous wife of World War I veteran Ernest Burkhart, in the true story of the Reign of Terror in 1920s Oklahoma. She thanked Scorsese and co-star Leonardo DiCaprio for their roles in changing the landscape of Native representation in the film industry.
